scripts.build: pnpm -C ui build && pnpm -C extension build
scripts.build:assets: pnpm -C ui build && pnpm -C extension build && node scripts/copy-assets.mjs
scripts.build:assets:win: pnpm -C ui build:win && pnpm -C extension build:win && node scripts/copy-assets.mjs
scripts.build:host: cd app/host && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target bun-linux-x64 --outfile ../src-tauri/bin/eisen-host-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:host:win: cd app/host && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target bun-windows-x64 --outfile ../src-tauri/bin/eisen-host-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe
scripts.build:host:all: cd app/host && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target bun-linux-x64 --outfile ../src-tauri/bin/eisen-host-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target bun-darwin-x64 --outfile ../src-tauri/bin/eisen-host-x86_64-apple-darwin && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile ../src-tauri/bin/eisen-host-aarch64-apple-darwin && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target bun-windows-x64 --outfile ../src-tauri/bin/eisen-host-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe
scripts.app:dev: pnpm run build:assets && cd app && bun run host:build && bun run tauri dev
scripts.app:dev:win: pnpm run build:assets:win && cd app && bun run host:build && bun run tauri dev
scripts.app:build: pnpm run build:assets && pnpm run build:host:all && cd app && bun run tauri build
scripts.app:build:win: pnpm run build:assets:win && pnpm run build:host:win && cd app && bun run tauri build
scripts.dev: pnpm -C ui dev & pnpm -C extension dev
scripts.clean: pnpm -C ui clean && pnpm -C extension clean
scripts.check: pnpm exec biome check ui/src extension/src && pnpm -C ui exec tsc --noEmit && pnpm -C extension exec tsc --noEmit
